assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Mundial S.A. - Produtos de Consumo manufactures and sells personal care products in Brazil and internationally. It offers cuticle and nail pliers, tweezers, and clippers, as well as nail polishes and other personal beauty items under the Impala brand; buttons and eyelets, and leather and plastic shoes; metallic articles of adornment; metallic and plastic articles and components; metal foundry ferrous metals and dies for stamping and plastic or metallic injection; knives, cutlery, butchers, pans, tableware, and household items; and scissors. The company also provides water pumps under the Syllent brand. Mundial S.A. - Produtos de Consumo was founded in 1896 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
